parameters.name: ArchiveName
parameters.description: The name of the archive to retrieve.

nested_items.name: EventSourceArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the event source associated with the archive.

nested_items.name: EventPattern
nested_items.description: The event pattern used to filter events sent to the archive.

nested_items.name: StateReason
nested_items.description: The reason that the archive is in the state.

nested_items.name: KmsKeyIdentifier
nested_items.description: The identifier of the KMS customer managed key for EventBridge to use to encrypt this archive, if one has been specified.

nested_items.name: RetentionDays
nested_items.description: The number of days to retain events for in the archive.

nested_items.name: SizeBytes
nested_items.description: The size of the archive in bytes.

nested_items.name: EventCount
nested_items.description: The number of events in the archive.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The time at which the archive was created.
